name: Oh My Zsh Customization
description: Set up and configure common Oh My Zsh plugins and theme(s)

plugins.description: Space-separated list of plugins to install and enable; see documentation for supported plugins.

theme.description: Theme to select, installing if necessary

disableAutoupdate.description: Disable Oh My Zsh auto-update check

extraAliases.description: File with extra alias definitions; relative to repo root

extraPowerlevel10kCustomizations.description: File with extra Powerlevel10k customizations; relative to repo root

extraAgnosterCustomizations.description: File with extra Agnoster customizations; relative to repo root
